featured.text: This probably explains why during the COVID-19 pandemic, horror and pandemic thrillers were the most-watched movies on digital movie apps.
People who are more sensitive to anxiety can panic after viewing a thriller.

definition.zh_def: 驚悚片，一種以緊張和懸疑為特點的文學或電影類型。
definition.en_def: A genre of literature or film characterized by excitement, suspense, and tension.
definition.example: The new thriller kept me on the edge of my seat until the very end.
